item.title: join array via powershell
item.description: join array via powershell 1 @{Name='SenderIPAddress';Expression={$_.SenderIPAddresses -join ";"}} 1 @{Name='Group LifeTime (days)';Expression={$_.GroupLifetimeInDays}} tech notes

item.title: PowerShell
item.description: OR: i said I’ll study Fundamentals Variables - store values and use as arguments Functions - list of statements or reusable commands Flow Control - If, ElseIf, Else Loops - ForEach, Do-While, Do Error handling - Try, Catch, Finally Expressions - operators and operands, computation - Expressions - PowerShell | Microsoft Docs Scope Global Scope - continues to exist after session ends Script Scope - no longer exists after file is finished running.

item.title: PowerShell - Extract Zip to path
item.description: Extract zip to path PowerShell 1 2 3 if(!(Test-Path -Path "$env:TEMP\Profile")){ Expand-Archive .\Profile.zip -DestinationPath $env:TEMP -Force } tech notes
